body:
yes hello can I please scream into the void now becAUSE I AM SO HAPPY SOMEONE ACTUALLY SCANNED /AND/ UPLOADED THIS???

dude like my brain is all alight still from the first realization that this was really happening rofl.

a friend and I both really like this artist so we bought a book each and shared the scans to save the money, I'll try to share it on here for anyone else who likes this artist (or even just this couple TBH rofl) once i FUCKING FIGURE OUT HOW TO UPLOAD.
